mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.coathId AS "coathId", a.qualification AS "qualification", a.obtainYearMonth AS "obtainYearMonth", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_certificates_coach( id, coathId, qualification, obtainYearMonth, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{coathId}, #{qualification}, #{obtainYearMonth}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_certificates_coach SET coathId = #{coathId}, qualification = #{qualification}, obtainYearMonth = #{obtainYearMonth}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
